oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - A New Generation Salutes Ray Charles - 2006-09-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Ray Charles tribute concert held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 30, 2006. In support of the exhibit I Can't Stop Loving You: Ray Charles and Country Music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jinero Hawkins II; Joey Ritchey; Jonathan Winstead; Kate Taylor; Michael Inge; Jackie Wilson; Descendants of Reality (Musical group); Jerami Matlock; Jason Salzar; Tiffany Green; Casme Barnes; Cadence (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress / (00:00) Opening comments by Justine Gregory / (02:34) Introduction of Janiro Hawkins II / (03:37) I Got a Woman (Joey Richey) / (07:45) Unchain My Heart (Jonathan Winsted) / (10:52) Georgia On My Mind (Joey Ritchey) / (14:48) America The Beautiful (Kate Taylor) / (18:34) Hallelujah I Love Her So (Michael Inge) / (21:00) House Band Introductions / (23:46) Don't Set Me Free (Jackie Wilson with Michael Inge) / (26:47) I Don't Need No Doctor (Descendants of Reality) / (33:30) Night Time Is The Right Time (Jerami Matlock and Nina Hibbler) / (37:49) I'll Be Good To You (Nina Hibbler and Jerami Matlock) / (41:25) You Don't Know Me (Jackie Wilson) / (46:00) Hit The Road, Jack (Jason Salzar with Kate Taylor, Tiffany Green and Casme Barnes) / (50:45) Drown In My Own Tears (Casme Barnes) / (54:42) A Tribute To Ray Charles In Rap (original composition) (Cadence featuring Joey Ritchie) / (01:00:25) Justine Gregory and Jinero Hawkings with final comments /
